title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Soil sensors in precision farming. Spectral based sensors. Development of sensors and controls. Variable rate technology. Precision chemical application. Crop yield monitors. Decision support systems; artificial intelligence. Remote sensing for precision agriculture. Vision systems. Field plot machines.
